Interface IPreExisting

The following pseudocode

interface IPreExisting {
    void foo();
    void bar();
    void baz();
};

can be rendered in the Interface Definition Language (IDL) as follows:

BOOST_IDL_BEGIN(IPreExisting)
    BOOST_IDL_FN0(foo, void)
    BOOST_IDL_FN0(bar, void)
    BOOST_IDL_FN0(baz, void)
BOOST_IDL_END(IPreExisting)
